titleStmt.title: A congratulation to France vpon the happy alliance with Spaine. Dedicated to the Queene. With the order and challenge of the knights of fame, to their opposites.
titleStmt.author: Menantel, François de.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Eld] for T. Thorp. and to be sold by W. Burre,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from colophon; printer's name from STC.
Some print show-through; some pages stained, creased and torn.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
